sentence_left: These types of cyber-fraud have been seen in the wild as supported extensions for Internet Explorer, Firefox, and Chrome; they become distributed through various monetization platforms during installation.
sentence_right: A disproportionately large number of legitimate social media sites have been hacked to silently redirect visitors to a series of malicious sites in order to show fake tech support popups or to steal credit card information.
label: Zscaler ((US English)) is a cloud security company, with headquarters in San Jose, California. It offers a platform for businesses that move their data to the cloud, with employees who work remotely.

mention: The fake tech support pages are used by cyber-criminals to promote their remote support services via scareware tactics.
sentence_left: Similar to exploit kits, the new tech support popup scams are targeting the websites that run on the DotNetNuke (DNN) content management system.
sentence_right: These bogus pop-up ads will state that a user’s computer is infected and will instruct the the user to call paid support service to remove the infection.
